Pre-Game Insights: Jose Ramirez and Yandy Diaz are the hottest hitters on the Cleveland Guardians and Tampa Bay Rays, who meet on Sunday at Progressive Field, at 1:40 p.m. ET.
The Guardians are -126 moneyline favorites in this matchup with the Rays (+107).
The total is 8 runs for the game (with -116 odds on the over and -105 odds to go under).
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game will be played at Progressive Field in Cleveland, Ohio.
The game can be watched on TV via BSSUN.
Others: The Guardians have won 61, or 65.6%, of the 93 games they've played as favorites this season.
The Rays have won in 36, or 45%, of the 80 contests they have been named as odds-on underdogs this year.
Sportsbooks have implied with the moneyline set for this matchup that the Rays have a 48.3% chance of pulling out a win.
